R

readActiveReaders() - Method in class writerReaderProblem.WriterPreference
this method is used for checking a number of active readers ath the moment
readActiveWriter() - Method in class writerReaderProblem.WriterPreference
this method is used to the test and it return a value of that if a writer is active or not
readInt() - Method in class writerReaderProblem.WriterPreference
this method is used by readers to read value sharedInt, which is incremented by writers
releaseRead() - Method in class writerReaderProblem.WriterPreference
If reader doesn't read then decrement number of them
releaseWrite() - Method in class writerReaderProblem.WriterPreference
if writer doesn't modify anything then change value of his status to false
RunExample - Class in writerReaderProblem
in this function we call object to make readers and writers, and then they start to read and (in this scenario increment) the value
RunExample() - Constructor for class writerReaderProblem.RunExample
